data.author: SeaPea Software

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time Round
Fixed graphics bug on black and white Pebbles.

Added support for MyQ LIGHT SWITCHES! :)
Also added a splash of color of Pebble Times
Fix for new door opener with integrated Gateway
Added another fix to remove invalid devices
Fixed "unknown device" that affected some users
This release should hopefully have fixed the "No devices found" error when your MyQ account and devices are setup correctly.

Added ability to copy raw device data for diagnosing issues.
Also made device parsing more robust as the device data format appears to change occasionally.
Improved error handling and fixed sending passwords with special characters
Added support for the "MyQ Garage" device which connects to most 3rd party garage door openers and effectively turns them into MyQ garage doors.

data.description:
Unofficial watch app for monitoring and operating Chamberlain/Liftmaster branded MyQ devices over the Internet (Requires MyQ Internet Gateway, usually sold separately) , now including the "MyQ Garage" device, which connects to 3rd party garage doors. 

Currently supports garage door openers AND light switches - other types of devices may be added soon.

- Uses SSL to communicate securely with the official MyQ servers
- Does NOT require a companion app on your phone
- DOES require your Pebble to be connected to your phone and your phone to have a data connection (bear in mind that you may be on the edge of your home wifi just outside your garage)
- Username and password is stored on your phone and are only ever sent to the official MyQ servers. Password is also encrypted on your phone

- Up/Down switches devices
- Select changes the status of the device

- To save Pebble battery it does not constantly monitor the device status except when opening/closing a garage door. To update the status, switch devices with the Up/Down button (even if you only have one device) or reopen the app
- Closes automatically after 2 minutes of inactivity to help avoid accidentally operating a device
- Assign it to a Quick Launch button in your Pebble settings for easy access

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time Round

data.title: HomeP - For MyQ Garage Doors & Light Switches
